titleStmt.title: A treatise against irreligion. By H.C. de Luzancy, priest of the Church of England, and M. of Arts of Christs Church in Oxford
titleStmt.author: De Luzancy, H. C. (Hippolyte du Chastelet), d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E.W. and are to be sold by Hen. Bonwicke, at the Red Lion in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary license leaf and a final advertisement leaf.
P. 181 misnumbered 167; text is continuous despite pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Red Lion in St. Pauls Church-yard
